title: Universe/Geometry/GeodeticLongitude
description: Geodetic Longitude [rad] of a target point relative to a reference ellipsoid centered on an observer point in the fames system

target.description: Target, a point in the frames system

observer.description: Observer, a point in the frames system

axes.description: Axes in which the observation is made, an Axes in the frames system

radius.description: Equatorial radius of the observer body (with length units)
